documents_menu.title: Allow attaching documents to items
documents_menu.info: Enabled option gives members the ability to attach documents to line items

columns.name: Name
columns.target_cost_tooltip:
Specify the price, which will be a guide for vendor selection.
The price is displayed only to you - members will not see it.
columns.deviation_tooltip: The field is available if the request parameter Purchase volume will be set as Deviation allowed by items and quantity
columns.currency_tooltip: The field is available if a list of currencies is created in the tender parameters
